A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I found this movie.... my favorite of the franchise. So many plot twists\, so many interesting dynamics\, it drove me crazy - and everyone that was on the movie with me. The reaction of the audience...to Kylo and Rey's dynamics\, to Luke's scenes.... was incredible\, they just couldn't stop clapping and i couldn't either.  I'm just amazed by this movie\, i watched it on the premiere and I'm gonna watch it again on Sunday. It is that good.
